scripts.prepack: npm run -w core build && npm run -w cli build
scripts.build: npm run -w core build && npm run -w cli build && npm run -w web build
scripts.lint: npm run -w cli lint && npm run -w core lint && npm run -w web lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run -w cli lint -- --fix && npm run -w core lint -- --fix && npm run -w web lint -- --fix
